questions.question_text: Which two commands are required when configuring a flow-export action on a Cisco ASA? (Choose two.)

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: AB
These links are all valid for netflow on ASA:
https://www.cisco.com/c/en/us/td/docs/security/asa/special/netflow/asa_netflow.html#configureflowactions
https://www.cisco.com/c/en/us/td/docs/security/asa/asa84/configuration/guide/asa_84_cli_config/monitor_nsel.html
https://www.cisco.com/c/en/us/td/docs/security/asa/special/netflow/asa_netflow.html
https://support.solarwinds.com/SuccessCenter/s/article/NetFlow-Configuration-Example-Cisco-ASA

I would say, the "flow-export event-type" and the "policy-map" are necessary commands for configuring flow-export actions. Changing the "flow-export template timeout-rate" is optional. The default value is 30 minutes. It is not necessary to change this. The flow-export actions would work with the default value.

Selected Answer: AD
A. flow-export event-type
D. flow-export template timeout-rate 15

These commands are used to specify the flow-export event type and configure the flow-export template timeout rate. The event type determines which events are exported, and the timeout rate specifies the frequency at which flow-export templates are sent.

Selected Answer: AD
A and d.. Not e

Selected Answer: AE
A and E. B not required

What are two benefits of using an MDM solution? (Choose two.)

choices.A: enhanced DNS security for endpoint devices
choices.C: remote wipe capabilities to protect information on lost or stolen devices
choices.E: allows for mobile endpoints to be used for authentication methods

questions.question_text: Which VPN provides scalability for organizations with many remote sites?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: A
DMVPN allows remote sites (spokes) to communicate directly without sending traffic through a central hub.
Unlike traditional hub-and-spoke VPNs, it dynamically establishes tunnels between remote locations.

Selected Answer: B
Phishing. Easy gimme question.
